trans-unit.source: This interface declares the methods required to support the <c>$expand</c> query option for an WCF Data Services.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface declara os métodos necessários para dar suporte à opção de consulta <c>$expand</c> para um WCF Data Services.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.ExpandSegmentCollection" /> paths to expand.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de caminhos <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.ExpandSegmentCollection" /> a expandir.

trans-unit.source: Applies expansions to the specified <paramref name="queryable" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Aplica expansões ao parâmetro <paramref name="queryable" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> object of the same type as the supplied <paramref name="queryable" /> object that includes the specified <paramref name="expandPaths" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> do mesmo tipo que o objeto <paramref name="queryable" /> fornecido que inclui o <paramref name="expandPaths" />especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.IExpandProvider.ApplyExpansions%2A> method may modify the `expandPaths` to indicate which expansions are included.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Services.IExpandProvider.ApplyExpansions%2A> método pode modificar o `expandPaths` para indicar quais expansões são incluídos.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> may implement the <xref:System.Data.Services.IExpandedResult> interface to provide enumerable objects for the expansions; otherwise, the expanded information is expected to be found directly in the enumerated objects.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> pode implementar o <xref:System.Data.Services.IExpandedResult> interface para fornecer objetos enumeráveis as expansões; caso contrário, as informações de expandido são esperadas a ser encontrado diretamente no objeto enumerado.
